about_the_game:
First Sexy Night is a short, but sweet visual novel about losing your virginity. It's a story about taking that first step with someone you care about and making the night memorable. The game is designed for players who are 18 years or older. The game contains lots of nudity and explicit sexual scenes where you get to explore every possible way to spend a first night with a sexy girl.



Features:

- A branching storyline with choices that matter
- Original artwork and relaxing music
- Sexy explicit scenes to enjoy
- Even more sexier implicit scenes to enjoy
- Many ways to fail
- Emotional investment
- Short and sweet experience

Story:

First Sexy Night is a visual novel about spending the first night with Ginny. You've known each other for a while and she seems to really like you, but the only problem is ... you are both still a virgin. You've been waiting for the right moment to make your move, but now that the moment is finally here, you're not sure what to do.

Ginny is a great girl and you really want to make this night special for her. You'll need to explore every possible way to make her happy and satisfy her needs. From romantic gestures to naughty bedroom talks, you'll have to do whatever it takes to make her feel comfortable and satisfied.

This is your chance to finally cross that line and lose your virginity. Will you be able to make the night unforgettable?

highlighted.name: Sometimes one has to go from behind

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity.

name: First Sexy Night

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: First Sexy Night is a short and sweet visual novel about losing your virginity. Can you make the night special for Ginny and finally cross that line? Featuring explicit as well as implicit sexy scenes!
